transcript: To you it is and to me you can talk yourself blue in the face, but there's nobody and no grave. So where are you?

segments.text: To you it is and to me you can talk yourself blue in the face, but there's nobody and no grave. So where are you?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: To you it is and to me. You can talk yourself blue in the face but there is no body and no grave so where are you?
